data.title: Rotation
data.solution:
answer = "false"

s1 = gets.upcase.chomp.chars
s2 = gets.upcase.chomp.chars

s1.size.times do
    if s1 == s2
        answer = "true"
        break
    end
    s2.rotate!
end

puts answer
data.statement:
A string rotation is done by taking each character of a string one-by-one and pushing it by one character to the right or to the left. Characters that are pushed "out" of the string return on the opposite side of the string. Rotating the string {{abc}} to the right once turns it into {{cab}}. Rotating it twice turns it into {{bca}}.

Given a string [[s1]] and [[s2]], determine whether [[s2]] is a rotation (by any amount) of [[s1]], <<regardless of case>>.

Example 1:
[[s1]] = {{AbcD}} and [[s2]] = {{CDab}}, print {{true}}
[[s2]] can be rotated 2 times to the right to be equal to [[s1]]: ({{CDab}} => {{bCDa}} => {{abCD}})

Example 2:
[[s1]] = {{ZYXW}} and [[s2]] = {{XYzW}}, print {{false}}
No matter how many times you rotate [[s2]], it'll never be equal to [[s1]]

data.constraints:
Length of [[s1]],[[s2]] <= 100
Strings [[s1]] and [[s2]] can contain any character on the ASCII table
data.stubGenerator:
read s1:string(100)
read s2:string(100)
write true or false
data.outputDescription: One string: {{true}} if [[s2]] is a rotation of [[s1]], {{false}} otherwise.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A string rotation is done by taking each character of a string one-by-one and pushing it by one character to the right or to the left. Characters that are pushed "out" of the string return on the opposite side of the string. Rotating the string abc to the right once turns it into cab. Rotating it twice turns it into bca.

Given a string s1 and s2, determine whether s2 is a rotation (by any amount) of s1, regardless of case.

Example 1:
s1 = AbcD and s2 = CDab, print true
s2 can be rotated 2 times to the right to be equal to s1: (CDab => bCDa => abCD)

Example 2:
s1 = ZYXW and s2 = XYzW, print false
No matter how many times you rotate s2, it'll never be equal to s1
Input
Line 1: String s1
Line 2: String s2
Output
One string: true if s2 is a rotation of s1, false otherwise.
Constraints
Length of s1,s2 <= 100
Strings s1 and s2 can contain any character on the ASCII table
Example
Input
AbcD
CDab
Output
true
